newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Ever 1997 net seen at 273 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Ever 1997 net seen at 273 mln pesos.

text.p: Retailer and property developer Ever Gotesco Resources and Holdings Inc said on Thursday it expected its net income in 1997 to reach 273 from a forecast 160 million in 1996.
The firm did not give comparative figures for 1995.
Ever said in a statement the scheduled completion of two new malls in Luzon island, one in Laguna province and the other in Dagupan, Pangasinan, this year would boost its income.

It said it will spend 1.2-billion pesos to construct Ever Laguna Plaza, a five-storey mall, on a 11.2-hectare lot. The other five-storey mall, to be called Ever Dagupan Mall, will also cost 1.2 billion pesos.
"The completion of the malls in Laguna and Dagupan will add 18.2 hectares of mall space to (Ever's) existing 26.1 hectare mall area," the statement said.
The firm said it also plans to spend another three billion pesos this year to build two other malls, one in Pampanga in Luzon and another in the southern Zamboanga province.
